title: Super Bowles vs. Super Spags
description:
Mina and former NFL offensive lineman Geoff Schwartz look ahead to Super Bowl LV. How will the musical chairs up front impact Kansas City's offense? Will the Chiefs blitz Brady aggressively? Will Tampa Bay running backs have to make a few big catches? Plus, they review the Matthew Stafford-Jared Goff trade for both the Rams and the Lions.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
